actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act commonly known as the Miller Act to raise the dollar amount of contracts to which such act applies from $2,000 to $25,000.

summary.text: Raises from $2,000 to $25,000 the minimum dollar value of any public contract to which the Miller Act applies (the Miller Act requires performance and payment bonds from contractors involved in construction, alteration, or repair of public buildings or public works).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act commonly known as the Miller Act to raise the dollar amount of contracts to which such act applies from $2,000 to $25,000.
